articles.content: The cost of building a battery-powered truck will “forever be higher” than a combustion engine equivalent, the boss of the world’s largest truckmaker has warned, as the war in Ukraine accelerates an … [+3272 chars]

articles.author: Annie Palmer
articles.title: Amazon faces another high-stakes union election as vote kicks off in Staten Island - CNBC
articles.description: Thousands of Amazon workers at a Staten Island warehouse are voting on whether to unionize.
articles.content:
Workers stand in line to cast ballots for a union election at Amazon's JFK8 distribution center, in the Staten Island borough of New York City, U.S. March 25, 2022.
On Friday afternoon, a stream of … [+6237 chars]
